overview: Mimi is sent to a women's reform school run by an evil warden, Dominique, and her henchwoman, Miss Patty. Mimi is placed in a room with Heather, a shy and quiet girl. Mimi begins to notice a lot of strange things going on in the reform school, and nothing will stop her from investigating. Not even Maria, the school bully, who notices her strange behavior. With the help of Trisha, a detective who's looking for a missing girl, Mimi will do what it takes to get out of the reform school and find out whats really going on behind these walls.
title: Reform School Girls 3
